articles.author: Krisztina Than
articles.title: On the trail of the mystery woman whose company licensed exploding pagers - Reuters
articles.description: She speaks seven languages, has a PhD in particle physics, an apartment in Budapest plastered with her own pastel drawings of nudes, and a career that took her around Africa and Europe doing humanitarian work.
articles.content: BUDAPEST, Sept 20 (Reuters) - She speaks seven languages, has a PhD in particle physics, an apartment in Budapest plastered with her own pastel drawings of nudes, and a career that took her around Af… [+5694 chars]
